name: Matching Jewelry Roll and Make Up Bag - Cameo
description:
please note, this item is *made to order*

Peas and Carrots, really. If you're going to leave the house, you are going to need to safely transport both your jewelry AND your face. So you'll need both a jewelry roll and a make up bag. It all makes sense. Why not buy both and SAVE?

Jewelry Roll:

- 13" tall by 6" wide and the pockets are 3.5" tall. tie it closed with the strings and pop it in your purse or a drawer.

- it has two pockets for bracelets, earrings or necklaces, and a ring-roll for, well, rings. the ring roll snaps down so it would be hard to lose them and the pockets all zip shut.

- the designer fabrics are 100% cotton and a layer of cotton batting is in the middle to provide padding.


Make up bag:

- perfect for the essentials

- measures 6" wide by 5.5" tall

name: Large Laminated Cosmetic Bag - Topiary
description:
please note this item is *made to order* 

when you're away overnight and you bring all your make up or toiletries, there exists that risk that one of the bottles will explode in your bag and ruin tomorrow's clothes. i'm anti-plastic garbage bag... and this is no exception.

this fabric from "parisville" by Tula Pink is LAMINATED and is therefore waterproof(ish)*! it's fully lined with quilting cotton and trimmed with a sheer pink ruffle.

throw in some personal items: make up, toothbrush/toothpaste, brush, hair gel, lotion, shave gel, shampoo, soaps, etc. etc. and transport it all together easily from bedroom to bathroom, and don't worry about messing up your travel bag...

this bag measures 9.5" by 9.5".

* i have had items break and/or leak while in the bag and sure enough, it didn't pass through the lamination barrier. but i guess i can't really guarantee it's waterPROOF because i haven't thoroughly tested it that way.

name: Potbelly Doorstop - Jade Barkcloth
description:
**made to order**

why doors can't always be engineered/installed so that they don't fall closed or open is beyond me. none the less, the fact is doors don't always do what they're told.

based on lotta's design, this pot-belly doorstop is the perfect solution with its fat little shape. it's a wonderful way to integrate a fabric you love into you home and it serves a great purpose too. you can't possibly stub your toe on it, and your little ones can play with it without worrying about smashed fingers (because honestly, what AREN'T they going to play with?).

fill it with rice, red beans or any other dried legume and zip shut!

made with barkcloth by robert kaufman, it's a beautiful and functional piece. measures 6" tall by 5.5" (at the base), tapering to 5" at the top.

the fabric is interfaced for structure and strength.

name: Travel Jewelry Roll - Optic Blossom
description:
please note this item is *made to order* i've been obsessed with jewelry rolls for quite some time now... it's SO handy when you're not at home and need a place for your goods. whether you’re traveling or you just start to feel strangled by your jewelry by 3pm everyday (i’m sure it’s not just me) and need to get it OFF, these rolls are a great solution. no plastic baggies (my previous method) or just leaving it out somewhere to get lost FOREVER... not that i’m fear-mongering. ever lose one pearl earring? me too... heartbreaking. so this one has two secure zip-closure pockets for bracelets, earrings or necklaces, and a ring-roll for, well, rings. the ring roll snaps down so it would be hard to lose a ring. this roll measures 13" tall by 6" wide when open; the pockets are 3.5" tall. tie it closed with the strings and pop it in your purse, suitcase, or even a drawer at home.

Monogramming is available. Click HERE for examples.

this print isn't your style? please check HERE for other options.

name: Cosmetic Bag - Delhi Blooms
description:
This zippered pouch is perfect for a gazillion little things. Put a shadow and a blush in, lip gloss, money, credit cards, keys, hair accessories, manicure supplies, or candies (maybe not all at once). Bag measures 6" x 5". Cute and functional boxed corners let you fit more in. Fabric is by Amy Butler from her Soul Blossoms collection. It's a 100% cotton, quilting weight fabric with a very soft brushed feel. The pouch is lined with a coordinating fabric from the same line and the whole thing is reinforced with a medium weight interfacing for structure and durability. If you don't buy this, I'm probably going to put it in my purse... I love it.

Monogramming is available. Click HERE for examples.
